description:
The Co-Working + Hot Desk option at Casa Marianas combines daytime access (8am-8pm) to the open plan downstairs co-working space and upstairs shared hot desk. Minimum three (3) month booking.

Hot desks are shared workstations intended for Members who want a reliable place to work beyond regular co-working hours, without reserving a dedicated office. You'll have access to a hot/cold water dispenser with unlimited usage along with the same 5GB fiber-optic internet that supports the co-working space.

During the day, Members can use both the open plan co-working area and hot desk seating. After hours, the hot desk area provides a quiet, comfortable place to continue working. 

People using the space at night often include students studying for exams, freelancers working with stateside clients, and others who need a dependable place to work late.

\*Hot Desks are subject to our [Utilities Policy](https://casamarianas.com/utilities-policy/) and [Casa House Rules](https://casamarianas.com/casa-rules/).
title: 2. Co-Work + Hot Desk
